title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python library to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other open-source models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list and delete models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers (via proxy) to interact with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG and user management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama offering synchronous and asynchronous APIs plus Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced Go CLI wrapper around Ollama with batch prompts, config profiles and progress bars.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s sidebar chat.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models through slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama that works offline on Windows, macOS and Linux.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Official container images with CUDA support for running Ollama on NVIDIA GPUs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Experimental retrieval-augmented generation pipeline combining Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex.

title: ollama-swift
summary: Swift Package Manager module for iOS/macOS apps to chat with Ollama servers over HTTP.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration treating Ollama as a local generator and embedder for NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and Blazor sample for chatting with Ollama models from C# applications.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBeaver plugin that adds SQL query generation and explanation using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-minecraft
summary: Minecraft server plugin enabling players to chat with local LLMs through Ollama in-game.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot with group and private chat support, streaming responses and per-user model selection.
